### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)), and pipes connecting them.

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
No copper plate mine has been found.

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory has been found.

### Pipe network for water at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)), pipes [(x=107.5,y=-34.5),(x=108.5,y=-34.5),(x=109.5,y=-34.5),(x=109.5,y=-32.5),(x=109.5,y=-33.5),(x=109.5,y=-31.5)].

### Pipe network for steam at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), and pipes [(x=117.5,y=-34.5),(x=118.5,y=-34.5),(x=119.5,y=-34.5),...,(x=119.5,y=-27.5),(x=118.5,y=-27.5),(x=120.5,y=-27.5)].

### Electricity network at position (119.5, -30.5)
Consists of small electric pole(position (119.5, -30.5)).

### Belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5) with direction UP.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when trying to insert coal into the boiler: Make sure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into the boiler.
* Errors when the boiler is out of fuel: Make sure to add coal to the boiler when it runs out of fuel.
* Errors when the steam engine is not connected: Make sure the steam engine is connected to a pipe network that provides steam.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No variables have been assigned by the agent.
